resources.string: Are you sure you want to leave Caelumero?
Unable to sign in at the moment. Please try again later.
Please use a secure password (at least 1 uppercase, 1 lowercase, 1 special character, and a minimum length of 8 characters).
Failed to sign in with Google account. Please try again later.
Attack on a single enemy hero
Attack on each enemy hero. If an enemy dies, excess damage hits the player. If no enemies are on the bench, your hero attacks the opponent directly for the amount of damage dealt.
Attack on a single enemy hero. Heals the hero for 50% of the damage dealt.

Attack on each enemy hero. Heals the hero for 50% of the total damage dealt. If an enemy dies, excess damage hits the player. If no enemies are on the bench, your hero attacks the opponent directly for the amount of damage dealt.
Attack on a single enemy hero. Protects the hero from the next incoming attack.

Attack on each enemy hero. Protects the hero from the next incoming attack. If an enemy dies, excess damage hits the player. If no enemies are on the bench, your hero attacks the opponent directly for the amount of damage dealt.

Hello and welcome to Caelumero!
I am Elara, and I will help you navigate in our world. But first, it would be nice if you could tell me your name.

Please enter your name in the field above.

%s! A fantastic name!! Now, choose a character that suits you. You can adjust your name and character later at any time under your profile settings.

Choose and confirm with Ok

What a great character!!

To get things started right away, I'll give you a starter deck. You can choose between an Air, Water, Plant, and Fire deck.
All decks are approximately equally strong.
Just select a deck that you think suits you.

(Simply click on one of the four buttons above)
You have chosen the %s-deck.\n\n Is this right?

An excellent choice %s, and I believe the deck aligns well with your preferences!

Now that we have everything you need to start the game, let's get going!
You can not sell your decks last hero!
You need to sell some cards since your backpack doesn\'t have enough space
Rare Guaranteed Booster\n(4 cards random 1 card rare or ultra rare)
random card rare or ultra rare
contains: 4 x random cards and 1 random rare or ultra rare card
exchange your diamonds for single cards or booster packages
Spawnrate: 54% supporter rare, 6% supporter ultra rare, 36% Hero rare, 4% Hero ultra rare
Rare or ulta rare random card
Spawnrate: 80% land cards, 12% Supporter normal, 1.2% Supporter rare, 0.1% Supporter ultra rare, 6% Hero normal, 0.6% Hero rare, 0.06% Hero ultra rare
Do you want to purchase the item for %s diamonds?
contains: 4 random water lands and 1 random water hero
contains: 4 random fire lands and 1 random fire hero
contains: 4 random air lands and 1 random air hero
contains: 4 random nature lands and 1 random nature hero
Increase the capacity of your backpack by 20 cards (available 3 times)
